amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide a six month extension of the H-1A non-immigrant nurse program which expired in September, 1995.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 28 in House Rept. 104-483, to extend the H-1A non-immigrant nurse program for an additional six months after enactment of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burr amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 262 (Roll no. 87).
